00058   const char *usage =
00059     "Usage: serverup [options] <server-name>\n\n"
00060     "Description:\n"
00061     "  This program checks to see if the server, specified by <server-name>\n"
00062     "  is up. return 0 if true, 1 otherwise. <server-name> may be one of the\n"
00063     "  following values: dfsbroker, hyperspace, master rangeserver\n\n"
00064     "Options";
00065 
00066   struct AppPolicy : Config::Policy {
00067     static void init_options() {
00068       cmdline_desc(usage).add_options()
00069           ("wait", i32()->default_value(2000), "Check wait time in ms");
00070       cmdline_hidden_desc().add_options()("server-name", str(), "");
00071       cmdline_positional_desc().add("server-name", -1);
00072     }
00073     static void init() {
00074       // we want to override the default behavior that verbose
00075       // turns on debugging by clearing the defaulted flag
00076       if (defaulted("logging-level"))
00077         properties->set("logging-level", String("fatal"));
00078     }
00079   };
00080 
00081   typedef Meta::list<AppPolicy, DfsClientPolicy, HyperspaceClientPolicy,
00082           MasterClientPolicy, RangeServerClientPolicy, ThriftClientPolicy,
00083           DefaultCommPolicy> Policies;
00084 
00085   void
00086   wait_for_connection(const char *server, ConnectionManagerPtr &conn_mgr,
00087                       InetAddr &addr, int timeout_ms, int wait_ms) {
00088     HT_DEBUG_OUT <<"Checking "<< server <<" at "<< addr << HT_END;
00089 
00090     conn_mgr->add(addr, timeout_ms, server);
00091 
00092     if (!conn_mgr->wait_for_connection(addr, wait_ms))
00093       HT_THROWF(Error::REQUEST_TIMEOUT, "connecting to %s", server);
00094   }
00095 
00096   void check_dfsbroker(ConnectionManagerPtr &conn_mgr, uint32_t wait_ms) {
00097     HT_DEBUG_OUT <<"Checking dfsbroker at "<< get_str("dfs-host")
00098                  <<':'<< get_i16("dfs-port") << HT_END;
00099     DfsBroker::Client *dfs = new DfsBroker::Client(conn_mgr, properties);
00100 
00101     if (!dfs->wait_for_connection(wait_ms))
00102       HT_THROW(Error::REQUEST_TIMEOUT, "connecting to dfsbroker");
00103 
00104     HT_TRY("getting dfsbroker status", dfs->status());
00105   }
00106 
00107   Hyperspace::SessionPtr hyperspace;
00108 
00109   void check_hyperspace(ConnectionManagerPtr &conn_mgr, uint32_t max_wait_ms) {
00110     HT_DEBUG_OUT <<"Checking hyperspace at "<< get_str("hs-host")
00111                  <<':'<< get_i16("hs-port") << HT_END;
00112     int error;
00113     hyperspace = new Hyperspace::Session(conn_mgr->get_comm(), properties, 0);
00114 
00115     if (!hyperspace->wait_for_connection(max_wait_ms))
00116       HT_THROW(Error::REQUEST_TIMEOUT, "connecting to hyperspace");
00117 
00118     if ((error = hyperspace->status()) != Error::OK)
00119       HT_THROW(error, "getting hyperspace status");
00120   }
00121 
00122   void check_master(ConnectionManagerPtr &conn_mgr, uint32_t wait_ms) {
00123     HT_DEBUG_OUT <<"Checking master via hyperspace"<< HT_END;
00124 
00125     if (!hyperspace) {
00126       hyperspace = new Hyperspace::Session(conn_mgr->get_comm(), properties, 0);
00127 
00128       if (!hyperspace->wait_for_connection(wait_ms))
00129         HT_THROW(Error::REQUEST_TIMEOUT, "connecting to hyperspace");
00130     }
00131     ApplicationQueuePtr app_queue = new ApplicationQueue(1);
00132     MasterClient *master = new MasterClient(conn_mgr, hyperspace,
00133         get_i32("master-timeout"), app_queue);
00134     master->set_verbose_flag(get_bool("verbose"));
00135 
00136     int error;
00137 
00138     if ((error = master->initiate_connection(0)) != Error::OK)
00139       HT_THROW(error, "initiating master connection");
00140 
00141     if (!master->wait_for_connection(wait_ms))
00142       HT_THROW(Error::REQUEST_TIMEOUT, "connecting to master");
00143 
00144     if ((error = master->status()) != Error::OK)
00145       HT_THROW(error, "getting master status");
00146   }
00147 
00148   void check_rangeserver(ConnectionManagerPtr &conn_mgr, uint32_t wait_ms) {
00149     int rs_timeout = get_i32("range-server-timeout");
00150     InetAddr addr(get_str("rs-host"), get_i16("rs-port"));
00151 
00152     wait_for_connection("range server", conn_mgr, addr, rs_timeout, wait_ms);
00153 
00154     RangeServerClient *range_server =
00155         new RangeServerClient(conn_mgr->get_comm(), rs_timeout);
00156     range_server->status(addr);
00157   }
00158 
00159   void check_thriftbroker(ConnectionManagerPtr &conn_mgr, int wait_ms) {
00160     int32_t id = -1;
00161     int timeout = get_i32("thrift-timeout");
00162     InetAddr addr(get_str("thrift-host"), get_i16("thrift-port"));
00163 
00164     wait_for_connection("thrift broker", conn_mgr, addr, timeout, wait_ms);
00165 
00166     try {
00167       Thrift::Client client(get_str("thrift-host"), get_i16("thrift-port"));
00168       id = client.get_table_id("!magic-query-table");
00169     }
00170     catch (ThriftGen::ClientException &e) {
00171       HT_THROW(e.code, e.what);
00172     }
00173     HT_EXPECT(id == -1, Error::INVALID_METADATA);
00174   }
00175 
00176 } // local namespace
00177 
00178 #define CHECK_SERVER(_server_) do { \
00179   try { check_##_server_(conn_mgr, wait_ms); } catch (Exception &e) { \
00180     if (verbose) { \
00181       HT_DEBUG_OUT << e << HT_END; \
00182       cout << #_server_ <<" - down" << endl; \
00183     } \
00184     ++down; \
00185     break; \
00186   } \
00187   if (verbose) cout << #_server_ <<" - up" << endl; \
00188 } while (0)
00189 
00190 
00191 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00192   int down = 0;
00193 
00194   try {
00195     init_with_policies<Policies>(argc, argv);
00196 
00197     bool silent = get_bool("silent");
00198     uint32_t wait_ms = get_i32("wait");
00199     String server_name = get("server-name", String());
00200     bool verbose = get_bool("verbose");
00201 
00202     ConnectionManagerPtr conn_mgr = new ConnectionManager();
00203     conn_mgr->set_quiet_mode(silent);
00204 
00205     if (server_name == "dfsbroker") {
00206       CHECK_SERVER(dfsbroker);
00207     }
00208     else if (server_name == "hyperspace") {
00209       CHECK_SERVER(hyperspace);
00210     }
00211     else if (server_name == "master") {
00212       CHECK_SERVER(master);
00213     }
00214     else if (server_name == "rangeserver") {
00215       CHECK_SERVER(rangeserver);
00216     }
00217     else if (server_name == "thriftbroker") {
00218       CHECK_SERVER(thriftbroker);
00219     }
00220     else {
00221       CHECK_SERVER(dfsbroker);
00222       CHECK_SERVER(hyperspace);
00223       CHECK_SERVER(master);
00224       CHECK_SERVER(rangeserver);
00225       CHECK_SERVER(thriftbroker);
00226     }
00227 
00228     // Without these, I'm seeing SEGFAULTS on exit
00229     hyperspace = 0;
00230     properties = 0;
00231 
00232     if (!silent)
00233       cout << (down ? "false" : "true") << endl;
00234   }
00235   catch (Exception &e) {
00236     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00237     return 1;
00238   }
00239   return down;
00240 }
